topic.title: Canada is the world's bitch!
topic.body:
When our government chooses to sell us out to China and bow down to communist regiems, allow 61 Isis fights on the country unwatched, allows illegal mass migration and hands out the tax payer money like water then leadership is nothing more then traitors to this country. Well we are laughed at like cowards world wide Justin Trudeau and his Marxist liberal government turns Canada into the world's bitch.
#ChangeMyMind

1591776814_1EisAdDMyEXWtPiKWM8t4wme5yXX1.body: I think that world be immoral to close anyone's account. Can't use oppression and tyranny to opress one voice. That's wrong. Challenge it with better ideas and community's coming together. That's the only way forward to a brighter future.
